title: Transparency, Now: Oakland Police Refuse To Release Body Camera Footage Related To NFL Baller Doug Martin’s Death
description: If you didn’t know any better, you might think that law enforcement agencies were deathly allergic to transparency to the point that police officers carry EpiPens next to their service pistols. According to ABC7, the Oakland Police Department (OPD) is refusin…
